resources.string: For windows type: \'ipconfig\' in command-prompt\n For Linux type: \'ifconfig\' in terminal

1. SAY:- "PRESS f1" , for pressing f1 
 				 similarly:- "PRESS f1,f2,f3 and so on}

 2. SAY:- "Type ANYTEXT" , for typing "any text"

 3. SAY:- "PRESS ENTER", for pressing enter
 				 similarly:- "press enter,backspace and so on"
 4. SAY:- "PRESS mute" , for mute the volume
 5. SAY:- "PRESS Page up" , for page up 
 6. SAY:- "PRESS page down" , for page down

1. SAY:- "PRESS Shift a" , for pressing shift+a 
 2. SAY:- "PRESS control a" , for pressing control+a 
 3. SAY:- "PRESS alt a" , for pressing alt+a 
 4. SAY:- "PRESS Shift control a" , for pressing shift+control+a
 5. SAY:- "PRESS alt shift f1" , for pressing alt+shift+f1
 6. SAY:- "PRESS escape" , for pressing escape

and so on

1. SAY:- "Increase volume" , increse the volume 
 2. SAY:- "Decrease volume" , decrease the volume 
 3. SAY:- "Increase brightness" , increse the brightness 
 4. SAY:- "decrease brightness" , decrease the volume 
 5. SAY:- "press home" , to tap the key home 
 6. SAY:- "press end" , to tap the key end 
 7. SAY:- "dp shutdown" , to shutdown the pc 
 8. SAY:- "dp restart" , to restart the pc 

and so on
